attributes.action: Stop killing innocent civilians in our name. We don't ask for these "wars", we don't believe the reasons for them. We just want peace.
attributes.additional_details: We, the citizens of the UK, want to live in peace with our world neighbours. We are sick of the economics of war and we don't believe in your reasons for starting such invasions. You should be tried in court for your crimes against humanity and we will fight for your incarceration if you continue to do so. We have enough problems to deal with on a global scale without these insults to injuries. Stop the killing and start the healing!
